title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-4, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by the local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same generate/chat/embed surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you swap Ollama models into any LangChain chain or agent.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) that wraps your local Ollama server in a ChatGPT-like interface.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; sync/async APIs, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem providing idiomatic generate/chat/embed methods against a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that adds readline history, syntax highlighting and conversation management to Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding assistant with autocomplete & explain features.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function-calling, GPU off-loading, Kubernetes Helm charts, etc.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to query Ollama models inside buffers; supports selection-based prompts and streaming answers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official compose stacks including CPU-only, NVIDIA & AMD GPU variants plus WebUI sidecars.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat with your documents offline.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that exposes Ollama models to channels with slash commands and moderation hooks.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration that injects an OllamaTemplate bean for chatting or embedding in Java services.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with IAsyncEnumerable streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app providing a chat widget, admin panels, and REST API that proxies to your local Ollama service.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes and insert summaries or Q&A back into your vault.
